name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kudos: Put Your Cards to Work

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the full potential of your credit cards whenever you shop online.

Make your cards work as hard as you do.

GET REWARDED WHEN YOU SHOP ONLINE

- Earn up to 25% back in rewards on 15,000+ stores

NEVER MISS CARD PERKS AGAIN

YOUR FINANCIAL COMPANION

- Track everything in one powerful view

Join over 300,000 happy users maximizing their rewards. 
Set up your wallet in less than 1 minute and start earning forever.
